ecshospital

Class HospitalAdministrator

  • java.lang.Object
    • ecshospital.HospitalAdministrator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Customizable

    public class HospitalAdministrator
extends java.lang.Object
implements Customizable
    Hospital Administrator controls the entire workflow of the ECS hospital.
    Author:
    Man-Leong Chan

    • Method Detail

      • readConfigurationFile

        public Hospital readConfigurationFile(java.io.File configurationFile)
        Read configuration file "myHospital.txt".

        The program will import all the patients and doctors, it will also construct the basics of the hospital.

        Parameters:
        configurationFile - The configuration file imported.
        Returns:
        The hospital constructed.

      • addPatient

        public void addPatient(char gender,
              int age,
              int illness,
              int recoveryTime)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Import patient using the information given in the configuration file "myHospital.txt".

        Error checking is done including illness code check and correct recovery time.

        Parameters:
        gender - The gender of the patient being imported.
        age - The age in integer of the patient imported.
        illness - The integer representation of illness that the patient suffers.
        recoveryTime - The time it takes to recover due to the illness (days).
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throw invalid information error.

      • addDoctor

        public void addDoctor(int iD,
             char gender,
             int age,
             java.lang.String specialism,
             Hospital hospital)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Import doctors using the information given in the configuration file "myHospital.txt".
        Parameters:
        iD - Doctor ID, automatically increment from readConfigurationFile(File).
        gender - The doctor's gender.
        age - The doctor's age.
        specialism - An integer representation of the doctor's specialism.
        hospital - The hospital that the doctor will work in.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throw invalid doctor specialism.

      • modifyIllnessRecoveryTime

        public void modifyIllnessRecoveryTime(int illness,
                             int minRecoveryTime,
                             int maxRecoveryTime)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Modify the recovery time for illness. This changes the illnessRecoveryTimeMap in the Customizable interface.
        Parameters:
        illness - The illness ID.
        minRecoveryTime - The minimum recovery time for the illness.
        maxRecoveryTime - The maximum recovery time for the illness.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the illness entered does not exist or if illegal parameter passed.

      • admitPatients

        public void admitPatients(Hospital hospital)
        Admits incoming patients from the arrayList incomingPatients.

        If the method from Hospital.admitPatient(Patient) returns -1, it would output a line saying "Hospital is full". It will stop trying to admit more patients from the arrayList incomingPatients.

        This admit patient right away when a bed is available.

        Parameters:
        hospital - The Hospital.

      • go

        public void go(HospitalAdministrator hA,

        Start simulation.
        Parameters:
        hA - The Hospital Administrator.
        configurationFile - The configuration file.

        Parameters:
